extendedInfo.description: Kids from 2 to 6 will have fun solving their first puzzles. With 15 different puzzles, nice sound effects, beautiful graphics and 3 levels of difficulty, this game will entertain your children while improving their motor skills. On each shape, a letter is written. On level 2 and 3, children have to put the shapes in the right order, so that they will learn the alphabet. Letters are pronounced when shape is put in the right place. The 3 first puzzles are free, the others can be bought inside the game. Now includes a parental control question to ensure that the additional levels are not purchased by mistake.This game is part of your "Learning is fun" educational game collection. Visit our website for more info: http://ar-entertainment.net/android/

reviews.title: My 2-year-old learned the alphabet from this game
reviews.comment: My daughter is pretty much hooked on this game, along with all the other puzzle games from AR Entertainment.  The dinosaur puzzles are particularly good, because they\'ve really reinforced her command of the alphabet.  It\'s well worth the in-app purchase to get all the puzzles.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really?
reviews.comment: 5 puzzles its a kids app stop being so cheap! Very dissatisfied.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like this game, it is really fun and the best part is... I love dinosaurs, they are my favorite animal in the whole wide super big world!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Go back to get next puzzle?
reviews.comment: I downloaded this app for my 2 yo son and have noticed that after a puzzle is complete, you have to hit the back store to get to the main screen to pick the next puzzle. This is confusing to a toddler that just wants to do puzzle after puzzle...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ripped off!! No help!
reviews.comment: Not Happy, this sucks. Paid money to unlock 1 level only (rip off) of puzzles, & it doesnt work at all now. Thanks for nothing, enjoy my money M Alexandre Minard.
reviews.author: Averil Hall

reviews.title: Great entertainment for my 2yr old
reviews.comment: My daughter loves this puzzle app. In app purchase unlocks extra levels, but it\'s well worth the price. Once my daughter gets tired of this one I\'ll purchasing a few of the other apps from AR Entertainment. Keep up the great work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice game with an annoying flaw
reviews.comment: My kids really like this game.  The app is free for the first couple puzzles, but will cost more to unlock all the puzzles.  It\'s kind of nice that you don\'t have to buy a separate app like those apps with Lite versions.  They have a slick little math question that keeps your kid from accidentally buying the extra puzzles.  However, there is no option to turn off the \"more games\" button at the bottom, which opens a browser instead of the app store, so my kids hit that all the time and get stuck in the web browser.  For an app that tries to be so slick by preventing accidental clicks, you\'d think that I could turn off that button.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 4 free puzzles then you have to pay
reviews.comment: There are only for free puzzles and they would bore my kids. I don\'t know if the paid ones are better but I\'m not going to find out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Strange charges.
reviews.comment: I tryied to get a new puzzle without provide an answer to the parent question and I done it (???). I will definately delete this application.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty crappy price
reviews.comment: 3 puzzles as free then pay $2.00 for 6 more. Than u got to pay $2 more for more. And I bet it continues like that where you\'ll end up paying $10 or more. Price needs to be cheaper.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice idea. Continually crashes
reviews.comment: Can\'t get through a level without it crashing on HTC one
reviews.author: Jon Ewels

reviews.title: Not quite there
reviews.comment: I don\'t like the zooming in and out.  It\'s confusing for kids.  The pieces are confusing in general
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cheapskates
reviews.comment: Needs more puzzles. My daughter literally threw my phone in boredom.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.comment: My 3 yr old is very into dinosaurs lately and I was so excited to find this app for her. She and I were both disappointed to see that only the first few puzzles are free and then you have to pay for more. Very misleading. Uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My son loves this game!!!
reviews.comment: My 3, now 4 year old son is really into dinosaurs. And I found this game and it was such a huge hit that I bought the full version. He is figuring out the puzzles so quickly! Just awesome!
reviews.author: lori chaney

reviews.title: Very well done
reviews.comment: My girls ply this often.  Having alphabeet ordered pieces is a good idea.  Graphics nice. Customer service responsive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Limited fun
reviews.comment: My 4 year old son really enjoys it but it\'s barely worth the download for 3 not that difficult puzzles
reviews.author: Angela Catalfamo

reviews.title: not so free
reviews.comment: only 3 free puzzles per difficulty level.
